title: The Sharp End of the Rainbow
description: The stories you'll find at The Sharp End of the Rainbow will transport you to a dystopian wonderland full of bizarre characters who engage in even more bizarre antics. These stories will make you laugh, cry, and gagâ€”but more importantly, they show humanity in the face of the truly absurd, and act as a mirror to the world around us.
author: Madeleine Swann
